post.html:
分数组成

  • Lab (36)
  • Class Quiz (4)
    • can also answer the question in class (1 for each)
  • Research Topics (15)
    • chosen from 18 topics
    • done in groups
    • in-class presentation
    • 10pts for correctness, 5pts for clearness
  • Homework (5)
  • Final (40)
